body_html:
Thanks for sending in this fix! Elsewhere in the project (for example), we use the following rename:

from six.moves import urllib

...and then use urllib.request.urlretrieve() throughout.

Can you please revise your change to use this style instead?
body_text:
Thanks for sending in this fix! Elsewhere in the project (for example), we use the following rename:
from six.moves import urllib
...and then use urllib.request.urlretrieve() throughout.
Can you please revise your change to use this style instead?
body:
Thanks for sending in this fix! Elsewhere in the project ([for example](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/d42facc3cc9611f0c9722c81551a7404a0bd3f6b/tensorflow/models/image/imagenet/classify_image.py)), we use the following rename:

``` python
from six.moves import urllib
```

...and then use `urllib.request.urlretrieve()` throughout.

Can you please revise your change to use this style instead?
